hooks.command: cd $CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR && FILE=$(echo $CLAUDE_FILE_PATH 2>/dev/null | grep '\.py$'); if [ -n "$FILE" ]; then uv run ruff format --quiet "$FILE" 2>/dev/null; uv run ruff check --fix --quiet "$FILE" 2>/dev/null; fi; true
cd $CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR && FILE=$(echo $CLAUDE_FILE_PATH 2>/dev/null | grep '\.py$'); if [ -n "$FILE" ]; then uv run ty check "$FILE" 2>&1 | head -20; fi; true
